subject: Procedure for submission of proposals for variations.
text: HRdu <cfu <TTHTf gfa4ut T Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 449 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 (a %*a67v, 43r 4Raa7t & Tnoarf TiATG+) Qa7. /Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #-5 Q 6, Aqer-10, ErrGTT;, 7, f67i-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn: 3rd March 2008 POLICY MATTERS: TECHNICAL (8/2008) [Decision taken on Admn Division'$ F.No.1 1041/235/2007-Admn:] Sub: Procedure for submission of proposals for variations. Deficiencies have been observed in the Variation proposals submitted by the Technical Divisions for seeking approval of the Variation Committee_ If has been decided that the following may be included while forwarding the proposal: Rates for non-BOQ items should be approved by the concerned Member and the reasons be recorded for arriving at the rates. The quantities will be verified by the Engineer: certificate in this regard be placed with the proposal of variation: (iii) Concerned Project Directors will also certify that 3% checking of the quantities have been undertaken by them: (iv) The note for the Variation Committee should be approved by the concerned Member. (v) While   recommending the proposal, the concerned  Technical Division will   certify the compliance of (i) to (iv) stated above in their note. 2. This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority. kozlo} (V.K. Sharma) General Manager (Admn:) All Officers at Hqs. AII PIUs/CMUs Sn M NHAL points
